title: Hydraulic Pressure Indications Both the Main and Auxiliary h…
caption_en: Hydraulic Pressure Indications Both the Main and Auxiliary hydraulic system pressures are psi. However, only the main hydraulic system pressure and the brake accumulator pressure are indicated.

title: The main hydraulic system pressure is indicated on -the SUMR…
caption_en: The main hydraulic system pressure is indicated on -the SUMRY page as MAIN - the EICAS-HYD page within the MAIN PSI indication - the Radio Management Unit (RMU)

title: Though the auxiliary pump operation and output pressure are …
caption_en: Though the auxiliary pump operation and output pressure are monitored, its pressure is not indicated at all.

title: Only the brake accumulator pressure is shown. ltis indicated…
caption_en: Only the brake accumulator pressure is shown. ltis indicated on -the SUMRY page as B- ACUM -the RMU as - the EICAS-HYD page within the BRAKE ACCUM indication and on the tape display.
